## Data Sources

This project uses publicly available data from the **American Community Survey (ACS)** 5-year estimates (2019â€“2023), provided by the **U.S. Census Bureau**.

We accessed this data using the [`tidycensus`](https://walker-data.com/tidycensus/) R package. Key variables include:

- `DP02_0152P`: Percent of households with a broadband internet subscription  
- `B19013_001`: Median household income  
- `DP05_0077P`: Percent of population identifying as White  
- `DP02_0067P`: Percent of adults with a bachelorâ€™s degree  
- `DP02_0057P`: Percent of individuals currently enrolled in school  
- `DP05_0018`: Percent median_age      

Data was retrieved programmatically using the Census API.
